content: *thick textured dishcloths highlight the squishy absorbent qualities of lily sugar n cream yarns yarnspirations * --- *skill level * easy --- **materials ** lily® sugar n cream® 70 9 g/2 5 oz 109 m/120 yds lily® sugar n cream® ombres 56 7 g/2 oz 86 m/95 yds robin s egg 01215 or lava lamp ombre 02445 or hot green 01712 or hot pink 01740 or white 00001 *1 ball* --- also available at michaels com on the wayback machine 1 --- 1 https //web archive org/web/20130729124016/http //www michaels com/double-thick-dishcloth/30266 default pd html
